item.title: 谷歌称与波兰建立人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: 谷歌首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）周四表示，谷歌已与波兰签署了一份关于加快采用人工智能的谅解备忘录。【原文：Google has signed a memorandum of understanding with Poland about speeding up the adoption of Artificial Intelligence, CEO Sundar Pichai said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 NHTSA 对超过 12.9 万辆本田汽车进行工程分析
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，在收到摄像头故障报告后，已开始对 129092 辆美国本田汽车进行工程分析。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday it had opened an engineering analysis into 129,092 U.S. Honda Motor vehicles after receiving reports of camera failure.】

item.title: 市场等待月度生产者价格数据，期货价格低迷
item.description: 美国股市期货周四趋于稳定，因为投资者在等待PPI数据，以判断美联储在前一天的通胀冲击之后的利率走向，而俄乌和谈的前景也鼓励了一些冒险行为。【原文：U.S. stock futures steadied on Thursday as investors awaited PPI data to gauge the Federal Reserve's interest-rate path after the previous day's inflation shock, while the prospect of Russia-Ukraine peace talks encouraged some risk-taking.】

item.title: 加密货币市场狂热推动 Robinhood 股价大涨，业绩创下新高
item.description: 周四，Robinhood 股价在盘前交易中大涨近 16%，此前该交易平台公布了创纪录的第四季度营收和利润报告，原因是加密货币和股票市场重新引起了零售交易的兴趣。【原文：Robinhood shares surged nearly 16% in premarket trading on Thursday, after the trading platform reported record fourth-quarter revenue and profit on the back of a resurgence in retail trading due to renewed interest in crypto and equity markets.】

item.title: Reddit 股价暴跌，投资者担心日活跃独立访客人数减少
item.description: 受谷歌搜索算法变化的影响，Reddit 的日活跃独立访客数未达预期，该公司股价在周四的盘前交易中暴跌 13%。【原文：Reddit shares tumbled 13% in premarket trading on Thursday after the social media firm missed expectations for daily active unique visitors, hit by a change in Google's search algorithm.】

item.title: 思科股价上涨，因人工智能设备需求旺盛，而特朗普关税带来压力
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）在周四的盘前交易中上涨了 6.4%，此前该公司上调了年度营收预期，原因是市场对其云网络设备的需求强劲，同时该公司也在应对美国最新关税可能带来的影响。【原文：Cisco Systems shares rose 6.4% in premarket trading on Thursday after the company raised its annual revenue forecast on robust demand for its cloud networking gear, while addressing any potential impact from the latest U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 波音公司的主要客户 Avolon 公司在罢工后的生产取得了 "令人印象深刻 "的进展
item.description: 波音公司的主要客户阿沃隆公司（Avolon）首席执行官周四表示，他对这家美国制造商在去年年底为期七周的罢工后在稳定生产方面取得的进展感到非常鼓舞。【原文：The chief executive of major Boeing customer Avolon said on Thursday he was really encouraged by progress being made by the U.S. manufacturer in stabilising production in the wake of a seven-week strike late last year.】

item.title: 德国卡特尔办公室警告苹果应用追踪工具可能违规
item.description: 德国反垄断机构周四在一份声明中说，德国反垄断机构已向苹果公司发出通知，对这家 iPhone 制造商的应用程序跟踪工具表示担忧，因为该工具可能违反大型科技公司的相关规定。【原文：The German antitrust authority has notified Apple of concerns regarding the iPhone maker's app tracking tool, which could violate rules for large tech companies, the regulator said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产汽车第三季度利润下降 78%，第三次下调年度预期
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四公布，第三季度营业利润下降 78%，降至 311 亿日元（约合 2.0184 亿美元），低于分析师预期，并第三次下调了年度展望。【原文：Japan's Nissan posted a 78% fall in third-quarter operating profit to 31.1 billion yen ($201.84 million) on Thursday, missing analysts' estimates, and cut its annual outlook for the third time.】

item.title: 日本马自达计划投资 1.5 亿美元在泰国生产电动汽车
item.description: 泰国投资委员会周四表示，马自达汽车公司计划在泰国投资 50 亿泰铢（1.5 亿美元）生产电动紧凑型运动型多用途车。【原文：Mazda Motor Corp plans to invest 5 billion baht ($150 million) in Thailand to produce electric compact sport utility vehicles, Thailand's Board of Investment said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行将董事长希金斯的任期延长三年
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）周四在其年度报告中表示，该行已将奈杰尔-希金斯（Nigel Higgins）的主席任期延长三年，以推进去年公布的扭亏为盈计划。【原文：Barclays has extended the chairmanship of Nigel Higgins for another three years as the bank looks to push ahead with a turnaround plan unveiled last year, the lender said in its annual report on Thursday.】

item.title: 日产与本田的对比
item.description: 日本日产和本田周四表示，它们已正式结束合并谈判。【原文：Japan's Nissan and Honda said on Thursday they had officially ended talks to merge.】

item.title: BAT 因加拿大诉讼案支出近 80 亿美元，困难重重
item.description: 英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco）周四表示，该公司将因加拿大的一项诉讼而遭受 62 亿英镑（77.4 亿美元）的损失，并警告称 2025 年孟加拉国和澳大利亚将面临 "重大 "不利因素，这导致其股价下跌超过 7%。【原文：British American Tobacco on Thursday said it would take a 6.2 billion pound ($7.74 billion) hit from a Canadian lawsuit and warned of "significant" headwinds in Bangladesh and Australia in 2025, sending its shares down over 7%.】

item.title: 可口可乐公司（Coca-Cola HBC）预测在充满挑战的经济环境中利润增长放缓
item.description: 装瓶商可口可乐公司（Coca-Cola HBC）周四预计，2025年有机营业利润将增长7%至11%，增幅低于去年，原因是充满挑战的宏观经济环境给增长前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Bottler Coca-Cola HBC forecast a 7% to 11% rise in 2025 organic operating profit on Thursday, slower than last year, as a challenging macroeconomic environment clouded growth prospects.】

item.title: 英国保险公司兰开夏因洛杉矶野火损失高达 1.65 亿美元
item.description: 英国保险公司兰开夏控股公司（Lancashire Holdings）周四表示，预计加州野火将造成 1.45 亿至 1.65 亿美元的损失。【原文：British insurer Lancashire Holdings said on Thursday it expects losses of between $145 million and $165 million related to the California wildfires.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行年度税前利润增长 24
item.description: 巴克莱银行周四公布的年度税前利润增长了 24%，略高于预期，原因是其投资银行报告 2024 年业绩强劲，且降息速度低于预期，维持了国内贷款业务的收入。【原文：Barclays reported a 24% rise in annual pretax profit on Thursday, slightly above expectations, as its investment bank reported strong performance for 2024 and slower than expected interest rate cuts sustained income in its domestic lending business.】

item.title: 联合利华将在阿姆斯特丹、伦敦和纽约上市冰淇淋业务
item.description: 联合利华周四表示，其冰淇淋业务将通过分拆的方式分离出来，并在阿姆斯特丹、伦敦和纽约上市。【原文：Unilever said on Thursday its ice cream business will be separated by way of demerger, through listing of the business in Amsterdam, London and New York.】

item.title: 律师称，如果董事会同意慈善条款，马斯克将撤回对 OpenAI 的竞购
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的律师在一份日期为周三的法庭文件中表示，如果董事会同意保留 OpenAI 的非营利性机构的使命，他将撤回对该机构的竞标。【原文：Elon Musk will withdraw his bid for OpenAI's non-profit arm if the board agrees to preserve the charity's mission, lawyers for Musk said in a court filing dated Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴董事局主席确认与苹果公司就国产 iPhone 开展人工智能合作
item.description: 阿里巴巴董事长蔡崇信周四在迪拜举行的世界政府峰会上发言时，证实了中国科技公司将与苹果公司合作，为在中国市场销售的 iPhone 提供人工智能技术的报道。【原文：Alibaba chairman Joe Tsai confirmed reports that the Chinese tech company will partner with Apple on AI for iPhones sold in the China market, while speaking at the World Governments Summit in Dubai on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本本田第三季度利润增长 5
item.description: 日本本田汽车公司周四表示，受美国汽车销售强劲和日元疲软的影响，该公司第三季度营业利润同比增长了 5%。【原文：Japan's Honda Motor said on Thursday its third-quarter operating profit increased 5% from a year earlier, helped by strong U.S. vehicle sales and a weak yen.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克称 Grok 3 已进入最后阶段，性能超过所有聊天机器人
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，他的人工智能聊天机器人和 ChatGPT 挑战者 Grok 3 已进入最后开发阶段，将在一两周内发布。【原文：Elon Musk said on Thursday his AI chatbot, and ChatGPT challenger, Grok 3, is in the final stages of development and will be released in about a week or two.】

item.title: 索尼上调盈利预期，因游戏业务表现强劲
item.description: 索尼公司周四将截至 3 月的年度营业利润预期上调了 2%，达到 1.34 万亿日元（87.0 亿美元），理由是其主要游戏业务表现强劲。【原文：Sony on Thursday hiked its operating profit forecast for the year ending March by 2% to 1.34 trillion yen ($8.70 billion), citing the strength of its key gaming business.】

item.title: 调查显示，大多数经济学家预计日本央行将在 2025 年下半年加息
item.description: 民间智库日本经济研究中心（JCER）周四对经济学家进行的月度调查显示，大多数经济学家预计日本央行将在今年下半年再次上调短期利率。【原文：Most economists expect the Bank of Japan to raise short-term interest rates again in the latter half of this year, a monthly survey on economists conducted by private think tank Japan Center for Economic Research (JCER) showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯因潜艇订单上调自由现金流展望
item.description: 工业集团蒂森克虏伯周四上调了其备受关注的自由现金流展望，理由是与德国军方的一个大型潜艇订单有关的10亿欧元（10.4亿美元）预付款。【原文：Industrial conglomerate Thyssenkrupp on Thursday raised its closely watched outlook for free cash flow, citing 1 billion euros ($1.04 billion) in advance payments relating to a major submarine order by the German military.】

item.title: 路透社采访欧洲央行决策者武契奇
item.description: 以下是路透社对克罗地亚央行行长兼欧洲央行决策者鲍里斯-武伊契奇采访的主要内容。【原文：The following are key quotes from a Reuters interview with Croatian central bank Governor and ECB policymaker Boris Vujcic.】

item.title: 德国商业银行将裁员 3900 人，主要集中在德国
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）周四表示，作为战略改革的一部分，该行将裁员 3900 人，并公布更宏伟的财务目标，以阻止意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）提出的德国和意大利贷款机构合并的要求。【原文：Commerzbank said on Thursday it would cut 3,900 jobs and unveiled more ambitious financial targets as part of a strategy revamp designed to head off UniCredit's advances for a tie-up between the German and Italian lenders.】

item.title: 德国商业银行抵御联合信贷银行的最新战略要点
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）周四表示，作为战略改革的一部分，该行将裁员 3900 人，并公布更宏伟的财务目标，以阻止意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）提出的德国和意大利贷款机构合并的要求。【原文：Commerzbank said on Thursday it would cut 3,900 jobs and unveiled more ambitious financial targets as part of a strategy revamp designed to head off UniCredit's advances for a tie-up between the German and Italian lenders.】

item.title: 法国罗格朗公司看到美国对中国商品加征关税的影响达 3,000 万美元
item.description: 法国电气和数字基础设施集团罗格朗（Legrand）首席执行官贝努瓦-科卡特（Benoît Coquart）告诉路透社记者，罗格朗并不认为美国加征关税是一个战略问题，并预计美国对中国进口商品征收10%关税的财政影响约为3000万美元。【原文：French electrical and digital infrastructure group Legrand does not see U.S. tariffs as a strategic issue and expects the financial impact of the 10% U.S. tariff on Chinese imports to be around $30 million, CEO Benoît Coquart told Reuters.】

item.title: 尽管工厂自动化业务疲软，西门子利润仍好于预期
item.description: 西门子周四公布的最新季度利润好于预期，尽管其工厂自动化业务仍在挣扎。【原文：Siemens reported better than expected profit for its latest quarter on Thursday, despite continued struggles at its factory automation business.】

item.title: 雀巢年销售额增长好于预期
item.description: 雀巢公司周四公布的年销售额增长略好于预期，原因是这家全球最大的包装食品公司提高了咖啡、巧克力和宠物食品的价格。【原文：Nestle posted a slightly better-than-expected annual sales growth on Thursday, as the world's biggest packaged food company raised prices for its coffees, chocolates and pet food.】
